name: HMNumberRange
desc: A set of numbers used to specify conditions for characteristic range threshold events.

items.name: init(minValue: NSNumber)
items.desc: Creates an one-sided number range with a minimum value.

items.name: init(maxValue: NSNumber)
items.desc: Creates a one-sided number range with a maximum value.

items.name: var minValue: NSNumber?
items.desc: The minimum value of the range.

items.name: var maxValue: NSNumber?
items.desc: The maximum value of the range.
